fact: You can learn about his sales and ask Sebastian about Mr. Pickett.
Sebastian sent Mr. Pickett to the wilderness southwest of Stellar Bay to find a Mantiqueen.
Return the journal to Sebastian and explain what happened to Mr. Pickett.
Sebastian will comment that he will read the journal although it seems very long.
Sebastian will thank the Stranger and give them 375 bits for their troubles,
completing the quest.
Mantisaurs are insectoid creatures native to Monarch.
They are aggressive, territorial, and very strong.
It is possible to deal with them one on one, but it is best to avoid groups of them for your safety.
The mantiqueen is the largest breed of Mantisaur.
Pickett was a Halcyon wildlife aficionado who used to tell fantastical stories to the children in Edgewater about the wildlife, not all of them true.
While he was in charge of the Emerald Vale Community Center,
Pickett was obsessed with acquiring a mantiqueen for the History of Emerald Vale Exhibit.
After a failed attempt to acquire a mantiqueen by Hunters & Trackers Ltd,
Pickett went to Monarch to acquire the mantiqueen himself.
After receiving information from Sebastian Adams about the location of a mantiqueen,
he headed out into the wilderness to see it for himself.
Sebastian's information was accurate but Pickett was eaten by his quarry in the process.
Only his journal would be recoverable from the mantiqueen's digestive system.
Sebastian Adams is a vendor in Stellar Bay who specializes in parts from exotic creatures.
The Stranger can help Celia Robbins ask Sebastian out on a date.
Outside the city walls, the lands were overrun by the native wildlife, as well as marauders and outlaws.
Stellar Bay is a company town located on the planet Monarch. It is owned and operated by Monarch Stellar Industries.
Stellar Bay is the largest saltuna producer on the Halcyon colony and used to be one of the most important suppliers of this resource.
